notes: Abdominal distension gives sense of obesity

modality: Worse from motion (Bryonia), better from motion (Rhus tox)
notes: Weight puts strain on joints

Sepia: Hormonal obesity, irritable, indifferent to loved ones.

rubric: Obesity with chronic constipation and bloating
modality: No urge for days, distended abdomen
notes: Digestive sluggishness adds to weight gain

rubric: Obesity after frequent steroid use
modality: Cushingoid appearance, puffiness, moon face
notes: Steroid-induced endocrine disruption

rubric: Obesity with recurrent flares despite well-selected remedies
modality: Case relapses or moves to new joints over months
notes: Requires intercurrent remedy to clear miasmatic block

rubric: Obesity since birth or early childhood
modality: Child is fat despite moderate food intake
notes: Constitutional childhood obesity with sluggish growth and dullness

rubric: Obesity with excessive hunger and thirst (diabetes risk)
modality: Eats large meals but still losing weight or not satisfied
notes: Diabetes-linked metabolic dysfunction or insulin resistance

rubric: Obesity with intense lethargy and desire to lie down
modality: Always sleepy, heavy body, disinclined to move
notes: Low physical energy and sluggish nervous system

rubric: Obesity in males with gynecomastia
modality: Fat chest in boys/men with hormonal imbalance
notes: Male hormonal imbalance with fat distribution on chest

rubric: Obesity linked to menopause
modality: Weight gain in abdomen, hot flushes, irritability
notes: Hormonal shift post-menopause causes fat retention

rubric: Obesity from prolonged grief without appetite change
modality: Withdrawn, emotional trauma, normal appetite
notes: Psychosomatic weight gain even without eating excess

rubric: Obesity with offensive perspiration in skin folds
modality: Foul-smelling sweat in groin, armpits, breasts
notes: Toxins expelled via sweat, stagnant lymph drainage

rubric: Obesity in children who are shy or timid
modality: Fearful, clingy, obese despite small appetite
notes: Mental-emotional constitution leading to weight gain

rubric: Obesity with strong craving for sweets and bakery
modality: Worse from bread, pastries, sugary snacks
notes: Sugar addiction and digestive strain increase weight

rubric: Obesity with compulsive nighttime snacking
modality: Gets up at night to eat, craves food when anxious
notes: Disrupted satiety and emotional triggers for food

rubric: Obesity from grief after loss of spouse or child
modality: Sudden weight gain following tragic emotional shock
notes: Obesity arises after deep grief; appetite may be variable

rubric: Obesity with dry, cracked skin and aversion to bathing
modality: Obese patients with poor hygiene habits, dry eczema
notes: Skin signs show detox stagnation and psoric block

rubric: Obesity with excessive salivation and foul breath
modality: Obese with mouth ulcers, craving for alcohol or meat
notes: Digestive toxicity and mucosal breakdown signs

rubric: Obesity in girls with delayed puberty and scanty menses
modality: Chubby girls with shy nature, hormonal delay
notes: Obesity associated with late sexual development

rubric: Obesity with craving for indigestible things (pica)
modality: Desire to eat chalk, earth, raw rice, etc.
notes: Indicative of deep nutritional disturbance or anemia

rubric: Obesity with varicose veins and hemorrhoids
modality: Heaviness in legs, standing aggravates
notes: Circulatory and portal congestion contributing to weight

rubric: Obesity in cold, chilly patients who can't tolerate winter
modality: Obese but cold-sensitive, worse in cold wind
notes: Low thermal vitality and poor peripheral circulation

rubric: Obesity with melancholic mood and social withdrawal
modality: Silent grief, avoids company, eats secretly
notes: Emotional repression expressed through overeating

rubric: Obesity in diabetic patients with intense weakness
modality: Obese yet weak, tired after meals, craving sweets
notes: Diabetes-induced energy loss with poor fat control

rubric: Obesity after childbirth with prolonged recovery
modality: Weight retained long after delivery, prolapse, back pain
notes: Hormonal and pelvic sluggishness prevent fat mobilization
